user: my emails are not syncing
I apologize for the sync issue you're experiencing with your emails. To troubleshoot this, please try the following steps:

1. Ensure that you have upgraded to the latest version of Loop Email.
2. Reconnect your email account.
3. If the issue persists, please reach out to our support team for further assistance. They will be able to help you resolve the problem.

Thank you for your understanding and patience.

user: move to team not working. Help please
Sorry to hear that you're having trouble with the "move to team" feature. To resolve this issue, make sure the team you want to move the emails to is added as an admin to the shared inbox. If you're still experiencing difficulties, please provide more specific information about the problem so that I can better assist you.

user: I need to remove members from this account ASAP leonardo@ellc.ca and its related domain names are no longer active. So that cant be used
To remove members from your account, go to the workspace settings and navigate to the "Members" section. From there, you can remove the members you no longer want to have access to the account. Please note that removing members will revoke their access and they will no longer be able to use the account or associated domain names. If you need any further assistance, please let me know.
